radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver demonstrates diffusely increased echogenicity. No focal liver lesions are identified. The main portal vein is patent with appropriate hepatopetal flow. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation with the common bile duct measuring up to 5 mm. The gallbladder is normal without evidence of stones. Limited views of the pancreatic body are unremarkable with the head and tail not well visualized.
